00014 #include "montecarlo.h"
00015 using std::vector;
00016 using std::complex;
00017 #include <numeric>
00018 using std::accumulate;
00019 
00020 void MonteCarlo::addFieldsReal(MonteCarlo::Spin v, FieldRealArray &array, int di, int dj, int dk) {
00021     int size = 2*s_cutoff_real + 1;
00022 #ifdef PACK_4FLOAT
00023     int sizex = (2*s_cutoff_real + 3)/4 + 1;
00024     for(int al= 0; al < 4; al++) {
00025         int r = sizex*(size*(dk + s_cutoff_real) + (dj + s_cutoff_real)) + (di + s_cutoff_real + al) / 4;
00026         int c = (di + s_cutoff_real + al) % 4;
00027         array.align[al][r].x[c] += v;
00028     }
00029 #else
00030     int r =  size*(size*(dk + s_cutoff_real) + (dj + s_cutoff_real)) + (di + s_cutoff_real);
00031     array[r] += v;
00032 #endif
00033 }
00034 
00035 #include <pthread.h>
00036 void *
00037 MonteCarlo::xthread_start_routine(void *x)
00038 {
00039     MonteCarlo *ptr = (MonteCarlo *)x;
00040     ptr->execute();
00041     return NULL;
00042 }
00043 int
00044 MonteCarlo::dipoleFieldReal(const Vector3<double> &v, int site2, Vector3<double> *ret)
00045 {
00046     double r2int = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z;
00047     // spherical boundary
00048     if(r2int - 0.01 > (4*s_cutoff_real_radius)*(4*s_cutoff_real_radius)) {
00049         return false;
00050     }
00051     double r = LATTICE_CONST/4.0 * sqrt((double)r2int);
00052     double ir = 1.0/r;
00053     double alphar = s_alpha*r;
00054     double ir_eff = _erfc(alphar)*ir;
00055     double derfc = 2.0*s_alpha/sqrt(M_PI)*exp(-alphar*alphar);
00056     double ir3_eff = ir*ir*(ir_eff + derfc);
00057     double ir5_eff = ir*ir*(ir3_eff + 2.0/3.0*s_alpha*s_alpha*derfc);
00058     Vector3<double> rij((double)v.x, (double)v.y, (double)v.z);
00059     rij *= LATTICE_CONST/4.0;
00060     Vector3<double> m2(s_ASiteIsingVector[site2]);
00061     m2 *= 1e-7 * A_MOMENT * MU_B;
00062     double mr = m2.innerProduct(rij);
00063     Vector3<double> hdip(rij);
00064     hdip *= mr * ir5_eff * 3.0;
00065     m2 *= ir3_eff;
00066     hdip -= m2;
00067     *ret = hdip;
00068     return true;
00069 }
00070 int
00071 MonteCarlo::dipoleFieldRec(const Vector3<double> &v, int site2, Vector3<double> *ret)
00072 {
00073     double k2int = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z;
00074     if(k2int >= s_cutoff_rec_radius*s_cutoff_rec_radius) {
00075         return false;
00076     }
00077 
00078     Vector3<double> m2(s_ASiteIsingVector[site2]);
00079     m2 *= 4.0 * M_PI * 1e-7 * A_MOMENT * MU_B / LATTICE_VOLUME / (s_num_spins/16);
00080     Vector3<double> k(v.x, v.y, v.z);
00081     k *= 2.0*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L);
00082     Vector3<double> hdip(k);
00083     if(k2int == 0) {
00084         // surface term.
00085         hdip = m2;
00086         hdip *= - s_dfactor;
00087     }
00088     else {
00089         double k2 = k.innerProduct(k);
00090         hdip *= - exp(-k2/(4.0*s_alpha*s_alpha)) / k2 * k.innerProduct(m2);
00091     }
00092     // summation of minus-k space.
00093     if(v.z != 0)
00094         hdip *= 2.0;
00095     *ret = hdip;
00096     return true;
00097 }
00098 int
00099 MonteCarlo::setupField(int size, double dfactor,
00100                        double radius, double radius_rec, double alpha)
00101 {
00102     s_bAborting = false;
00103     s_L = size;
00104     s_num_spins = size*size*size*16;
00105     s_dfactor = dfactor;
00106 
00107     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00108         s_ASiteIsingVector[site1].x = cg_ASiteIsingAxes[site1][0] / sqrt(3.0);
00109         s_ASiteIsingVector[site1].y = cg_ASiteIsingAxes[site1][1] / sqrt(3.0);
00110         s_ASiteIsingVector[site1].z = cg_ASiteIsingAxes[site1][2] / sqrt(3.0);
00111     }
00112     
00113     int cutoff_real = (int)ceil(radius - 0.01);
00114     alpha /= LATTICE_CONST;
00115     s_alpha = alpha;
00116     double mag_cutoff = _erfc(alpha*LATTICE_CONST*radius);
00117     fprintf(stderr, "Magnitude at the cutoff boundary for real = %g%%\n", 100.0*mag_cutoff);
00118     s_cutoff_real = cutoff_real;
00119     s_cutoff_real_radius = radius;
00120 //    double radius_rec = sqrt(-log(mag_cutoff)) * 2.0 * alpha / (2.0*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L));
00121     int cutoff_rec = (int)ceil(radius_rec);
00122     s_cutoff_rec = cutoff_rec;
00123     s_cutoff_rec_radius = radius_rec;
00124     double mag_cutoff_rec = exp(-pow(radius_rec / (2.0 * alpha) * (2.0 * M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L)), 2.0)); 
00125     fprintf(stderr, "Magnitude at the cutoff boundary for rec = %g%%\n", 100.0*mag_cutoff_rec);
00126 
00127     for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00128     #ifdef PACK_4FLOAT
00129         int size = (cutoff_real*2+1)*(cutoff_real*2+1)*((cutoff_real*2 + 3)/4 + 1);
00130         for(int al = 0; al < 4; al++) {
00131             for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00132                 s_fields_real[site1][site2].align[al].clear();
00133                 s_fields_real[site1][site2].align[al].resize(size);
00134             }
00135             for(int d = 0; d < 3; d++) {
00136                 for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00137                     s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][d].align[al].clear();
00138                     s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][d].align[al].resize(size);
00139                 }
00140                 for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 8; site1++) {
00141                     s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][d].align[al].clear();
00142                     s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][d].align[al].resize(size);
00143                 }
00144                 for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 48; site1++) {
00145                     s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][d].align[al].clear();
00146                     s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][d].align[al].resize(size);
00147                 }
00148             }
00149         }
00150     #else
00151         int size = (cutoff_real*2+1)*(cutoff_real*2+1)*(cutoff_real*2+1);
00152         for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00153             s_fields_real[site1][site2].clear();
00154             s_fields_real[site1][site2].resize(size, 0.0);
00155         }
00156         for(int d = 0; d < 3; d++) {
00157             for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00158                 s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][d].clear();
00159                 s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][d].resize(size, 0.0);
00160             }
00161             for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 8; site1++) {
00162                 s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][d].clear();
00163                 s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][d].resize(size, 0.0);
00164             }
00165             for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 48; site1++) {
00166                 s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][d].clear();
00167                 s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][d].resize(size, 0.0);
00168             }
00169         }
00170     #endif
00171     }
00172 
00173 
00174     int cnt_n = 0;
00175     int cnt_nn = 0;
00176     double d_nn = 0.0;
00177     int cnt_nnn = 0;
00178     int cnt_3nn = 0;
00179     vector<int> cnt_n_r2(4*(cutoff_real+1)*4*(cutoff_real+1));
00180     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00181         Vector3<double> d1(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00182         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00183             for(int dk = -cutoff_real; dk <= cutoff_real; dk++) {
00184                 for(int dj = -cutoff_real; dj <= cutoff_real; dj++) {
00185                     for(int di = -cutoff_real; di <= cutoff_real; di++) {                
00186                         VectorInt v = distance(site1,site2,di,dj,dk);
00187                         int r2int = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z;
00188                         if(r2int == 0) {
00189                             continue;
00190                         }
00191                         Vector3<double> hdip;
00192                         if(!dipoleFieldReal(v, site2, &hdip))
00193                             continue;
00194                         double hdip_d1 = d1.innerProduct(hdip);
00195                         ASSERT(fabs(hdip_d1) < 1.0);
00196                         //            fprintf(stderr, "%g\n",h);
00197 
00198                         //counts for real-space.
00199                         cnt_n_r2[r2int]++;
00200                         addFieldsReal(hdip_d1, s_fields_real[site1][site2], di, dj, dk);
00201                 
00202                         cnt_n++;
00203                         // Nearest neighbor.
00204                         if(r2int <= 2*1*1) {
00205                             ASSERT(r2int == 2);
00206                             Vector3<double> d2(s_ASiteIsingVector[site2]);
00207     
00208                             d_nn += hdip_d1 / (K_B / (A_MOMENT * MU_B)) * 3.0 * (d1.innerProduct(d2));
00209                             addFieldsReal(
00210                                 J_NN * K_B / (A_MOMENT * MU_B) * 3.0 * (d1.innerProduct(d2))
00211                                 , s_fields_real[site1][site2], di, dj, dk);
00212                             //                fprintf(stderr, "%g\n",g_fields[didx]);
00213                             cnt_nn++;
00214                             continue;
00215                         }
00216                         // Next nearest neighbor.
00217                         if(r2int <= 6) {
00218                             cnt_nnn++;
00219                             continue;
00220                         }
00221                         // 3rd nearest neighbor.
00222                         if(r2int <= 8) {
00223                             cnt_3nn++;
00224                             continue;
00225                         }
00226                     }
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230     }
00231     
00232     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00233         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00234             for(int dk = -cutoff_real; dk <= cutoff_real; dk++) {
00235                 for(int dj = -cutoff_real; dj <= cutoff_real; dj++) {
00236                     for(int di = -cutoff_real; di <= cutoff_real; di++) {                
00237                         Vector3<double> v;
00238                         v.x = 4*di + cg_ASitePositions[site2][0] - cg_BSitePositions[site1][0];
00239                         v.y = 4*dj + cg_ASitePositions[site2][1] - cg_BSitePositions[site1][1];
00240                         v.z = 4*dk + cg_ASitePositions[site2][2] - cg_BSitePositions[site1][2];
00241                         Vector3<double> hdip;
00242                         if(!dipoleFieldReal(v, site2, &hdip))
00243                             continue;
00244                         addFieldsReal(hdip.x, s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][0], di, dj, dk);
00245                         addFieldsReal(hdip.y, s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][1], di, dj, dk);
00246                         addFieldsReal(hdip.z, s_fields_real_B[site1][site2][2], di, dj, dk);
00247                     }
00248                 }
00249             }
00250         }
00251     }
00252     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 8; site1++) {
00253         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00254             for(int dk = -cutoff_real; dk <= cutoff_real; dk++) {
00255                 for(int dj = -cutoff_real; dj <= cutoff_real; dj++) {
00256                     for(int di = -cutoff_real; di <= cutoff_real; di++) {                
00257                         Vector3<double> v;
00258                         v.x = 4*di + cg_ASitePositions[site2][0] - cg_8aSitePositions[site1][0] * 0.5;
00259                         v.y = 4*dj + cg_ASitePositions[site2][1] - cg_8aSitePositions[site1][1] * 0.5;
00260                         v.z = 4*dk + cg_ASitePositions[site2][2] - cg_8aSitePositions[site1][2] * 0.5;
00261                         Vector3<double> hdip;
00262                         if(!dipoleFieldReal(v, site2, &hdip))
00263                             continue;
00264                         double r2int = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z;
00265                         //Nearest Neighbor.
00266                         if(r2int < 0.7501) {
00267                             hdip *= AHF_DY_O1 / AHF_DY_O1_DIPOLE;
00268                         }
00269                         addFieldsReal(hdip.x, s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][0], di, dj, dk);
00270                         addFieldsReal(hdip.y, s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][1], di, dj, dk);
00271                         addFieldsReal(hdip.z, s_fields_real_8a[site1][site2][2], di, dj, dk);
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274             }
00275         }
00276     }
00277     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 48; site1++) {
00278         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00279             for(int dk = -cutoff_real; dk <= cutoff_real; dk++) {
00280                 for(int dj = -cutoff_real; dj <= cutoff_real; dj++) {
00281                     for(int di = -cutoff_real; di <= cutoff_real; di++) {                
00282                         Vector3<double> v;
00283                         v.x = 4*di + cg_ASitePositions[site2][0] - cg_48fSitePositions[site1][0] * 0.5;
00284                         v.y = 4*dj + cg_ASitePositions[site2][1] - cg_48fSitePositions[site1][1] * 0.5;
00285                         v.z = 4*dk + cg_ASitePositions[site2][2] - cg_48fSitePositions[site1][2] * 0.5;
00286                         Vector3<double> hdip;
00287                         if(!dipoleFieldReal(v, site2, &hdip))
00288                             continue;
00289                         addFieldsReal(hdip.x, s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][0], di, dj, dk);
00290                         addFieldsReal(hdip.y, s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][1], di, dj, dk);
00291                         addFieldsReal(hdip.z, s_fields_real_48f[site1][site2][2], di, dj, dk);
00292                     }
00293                 }
00294             }
00295         }
00296     }
00297 
00298     s_4r2_neighbor.clear();
00299     for(int i = 0; i < (int)cnt_n_r2.size(); i++) {
00300         if(cnt_n_r2[i] == 0) continue;
00301 //        fprintf(stderr, "neighbor r = %f, cnt = %f\n", sqrt((double)i)/4.0, cnt_n_r2[i]/16.0);
00302         s_4r2_neighbor.push_back(i);
00303     }
00304     ASSERT(cnt_n % 16 == 0);
00305     cnt_n /= 16;
00306     fprintf(stderr, "# of neighbors = %d\n", cnt_n);
00307     ASSERT(cnt_nn % 16 == 0);
00308     cnt_nn /= 16;
00309     ASSERT(cnt_nn % 6 == 0);
00310     fprintf(stderr, "# of nearest neighbors = %d\n", cnt_nn);
00311     ASSERT(cnt_nnn % 16 == 0);
00312     cnt_nnn /= 16;
00313     ASSERT(cnt_nnn % 6 == 0);
00314     fprintf(stderr, "# of next nearest neighbors = %d\n", cnt_nnn);
00315     ASSERT(cnt_3nn % 16 == 0);
00316     cnt_3nn /= 16;
00317     ASSERT(cnt_3nn % 6 == 0);
00318     fprintf(stderr, "# of 3rd nearest neighbors = %d\n", cnt_3nn);
00319     d_nn /= 16;
00320     d_nn /= cnt_nn;
00321     fprintf(stderr, "D_NN = %g [K]\n", d_nn);
00322         
00323     int rec_size = (2*cutoff_rec + 1)*(2*cutoff_rec + 1)*(cutoff_rec + 1);
00324     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00325         Vector3<double> d1(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00326 
00327         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00328             s_fields_rec[site1][site2].clear();
00329             s_fields_rec[site1][site2].resize(rec_size);
00330 
00331             for(int kz = 0; kz <= cutoff_rec; kz++) {
00332                 for(int ky = -cutoff_rec; ky <= cutoff_rec; ky++) {
00333                     for(int kx = -cutoff_rec; kx <= cutoff_rec; kx++) {
00334                         VectorInt v(kx, ky, kz);
00335                         Vector3<double> hdip;
00336                         if(!dipoleFieldRec(v, site2, &hdip))
00337                             continue;             
00338                         int ridx = reciprocal_index(kx,ky,kz);
00339                         s_fields_rec[site1][site2][ridx] = hdip.innerProduct(d1);
00340                     }
00341                 }
00342             }
00343         }
00344     }
00345     for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00346         s_fields_rec_generic[site2].clear();
00347         s_fields_rec_generic[site2].resize(rec_size);
00348 
00349         for(int kz = 0; kz <= cutoff_rec; kz++) {
00350             for(int ky = -cutoff_rec; ky <= cutoff_rec; ky++) {
00351                 for(int kx = -cutoff_rec; kx <= cutoff_rec; kx++) {
00352                     VectorInt v(kx, ky, kz);
00353                     Vector3<double> hdip;
00354                     if(!dipoleFieldRec(v, site2, &hdip))
00355                         continue;             
00356                     int ridx = reciprocal_index(kx,ky,kz);
00357                     s_fields_rec_generic[site2][ridx] = hdip;
00358                 }
00359             }
00360         }
00361     }
00362     // For self-energy correction.
00363     s_fields_rec_sum = accumulate(s_fields_rec[0][0].begin(), s_fields_rec[0][0].end(), 0.0);
00364 
00365     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00366         s_exp_ph[site1].clear();
00367         if(rec_size*s_num_spins*sizeof(double) < 500000000) {
00368             //create deep cache.
00369             s_exp_ph[site1].resize(rec_size * s_num_spins / 16);
00370     
00371             Vector3<double> pos1(cg_ASitePositions[site1]);
00372             pos1 *= LATTICE_CONST / 4.0;
00373             for(int k = 0; k < s_L; k++) {
00374                 for(int j = 0; j < s_L; j++) {
00375                     for(int i = 0; i < s_L; i++) {
00376                         int lidx = lattice_index(i,j,k);
00377                         double phx = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (i * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.x);
00378                         double phy = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (j * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.y);
00379                         double phz = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (k * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.z);
00380                         complex<double> exp_i_rx = exp(complex<double>(0.0, phx));
00381                         complex<double> exp_i_ry = exp(complex<double>(0.0, phy));
00382                         complex<double> exp_i_rz = exp(complex<double>(0.0, phz));
00383                 
00384                         complex<double> exp_ikrz = exp(complex<double>(0.0, -cutoff_rec * (phx + phy)));
00385                         for(int kz = 0; kz <= cutoff_rec; kz++) {
00386                             complex<double> exp_ikryz = exp_ikrz;
00387                             for(int ky = -cutoff_rec; ky <= cutoff_rec; ky++) {
00388                                 complex<double> exp_ikr = exp_ikryz;
00389                                 for(int kx = -cutoff_rec; kx <= cutoff_rec; kx++) {
00390                                     int ridx = reciprocal_index(kx,ky,kz);
00391                                     s_exp_ph[site1][lidx * rec_size + ridx] = exp_ikr;
00392                                     exp_ikr *= exp_i_rx;
00393                                 }
00394                                 exp_ikryz *= exp_i_ry;
00395                             }
00396                             exp_ikrz *= exp_i_rz;
00397                         }
00398                         ASSERT(abs(complex<double>(s_exp_ph[site1][(lidx+1) * rec_size-1])
00399                                    /exp(complex<double>(0.0, (cutoff_rec) * (phx + phy + phz)))
00400                                    - complex<double>(1.0,0)) < 1e-6);
00401                     }
00402                 }
00403             }
00404         }
00405     }
00406 
00407     return cnt_n;
00408 }
00409 
00410 inline double
00411 MonteCarlo::iterate_real_redirected(int cnt, const FieldRealArray &array, int i, int j, int k, int site2)
00412 {
00413     int cutoff = s_cutoff_real;
00414     ASSERT(cnt == cutoff*2 + 1);
00415 #ifdef PACK_4FLOAT
00416     int l = (s_L - 1) / 4 + 1;
00417     int al = spins_real_index(i - cutoff,0,0) % 4;
00418     PackedSpin h;
00419     PackedSpin *pspin_i = &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i - cutoff,0,0) / 4];
00420     asm ("movaps %0, %%xmm3"
00421          :
00422          : "m" (h)
00423          : "%xmm3");
00424     const PackedSpin *pfield = &array.align[al][0];
00425     for(int dk = -cutoff; dk <= cutoff; dk++) {
00426         PackedSpin *pspin_k = pspin_i + spins_real_index(-s_L, 0, (k+s_L+dk) % s_L) / 4;
00427         for(int dj = -cutoff; dj <= cutoff; dj++) {
00428             PackedSpin *pspin = pspin_k + spins_real_index(-s_L, (j+s_L+dj) % s_L, 0) / 4;
00429 //            ASSERT(pspin == &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i - cutoff,(j+s_L+dj) % s_L,(k+s_L+dk) % s_L)]);
00430             for(int n = 0; n < (cnt + 2) / 4 + 1; n++) {
00431                 asm ("movaps %0, %%xmm1;"
00432                      "movaps %1, %%xmm2;"
00433                      "mulps %%xmm1, %%xmm2;"
00434                      "addps %%xmm2, %%xmm3"
00435                      :
00436                      : "m" (pspin[n]), "m" (pfield[n])
00437                      : "%xmm1", "%xmm2", "%xmm3");
00438 //                PackedSpin x(pspin[n]);
00439 //                x *= pfield[n];
00440 //                h += x;
00441             }
00442             pfield+=(cnt + 2) / 4 + 1;
00443 //            ASSERT(pspin == &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i + cutoff + 1,(j+s_L+dj) % s_L,(k+s_L+dk) % s_L)]);
00444         }
00445     }
00446     asm ("movaps %%xmm3, %0"
00447          : "=m" (h)
00448          :
00449          : "%xmm3");
00450     ASSERT(pfield == &*array.align[al].end());
00451     return h.sum();
00452 #else
00453     Spin h = 0.0;
00454     // note that spin images are repeated outside boundary along x.
00455     Spin *pspin_i = &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i - cutoff, 0, 0)];
00456     const Spin *pfield = &array[0];
00457     for(int dk = -cutoff; dk <= cutoff; dk++) {
00458         Spin *pspin_k = pspin_i + spins_real_index(-s_L, 0, (k+s_L+dk) % s_L);
00459         for(int dj = -cutoff; dj <= cutoff; dj++) {
00460             Spin *pspin = pspin_k + spins_real_index(-s_L, (j+s_L+dj) % s_L, 0);
00461 //            ASSERT(pspin == &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i - cutoff,(j+s_L+dj) % s_L,(k+s_L+dk) % s_L)]);
00462             for(int n = 0; n < cnt; n++) {
00463                 h += pfield[n] * pspin[n];
00464             }
00465             pfield+=cnt;
00466 //            ASSERT(pspin == &m_spins_real[site2][spins_real_index(i + cutoff + 1,(j+s_L+dj) % s_L,(k+s_L+dk) % s_L)]);
00467         }
00468     }
00469     ASSERT(pfield == &*array.end());
00470     return h;
00471 #endif
00472 }
00473 
00474 MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00475 MonteCarlo::iterate_real_generic(const FieldRealArray array[16][3], int i, int j, int k)
00476 {
00477     int cutoff = s_cutoff_real;
00478     int cnt = 2*cutoff + 1;
00479     Vector3<double> hall;
00480     for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00481         hall.x += iterate_real_redirected(cnt, array[site2][0], i, j, k, site2);
00482         hall.y += iterate_real_redirected(cnt, array[site2][1], i, j, k, site2);
00483         hall.z += iterate_real_redirected(cnt, array[site2][2], i, j, k, site2);
00484     }
00485     return hall;
00486 }
00487 
00488 double
00489 MonteCarlo::iterate_real(int site1, int i, int j, int k, int site2)
00490 {
00491     int cnt = 2 * s_cutoff_real + 1;
00492     // Trick to use constant count. use -funroll-loops. to enhance optimization.
00493     switch(cnt) {
00494     case 3:
00495         return iterate_real_redirected(3, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00496     case 5:
00497         return iterate_real_redirected(5, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00498     case 7:
00499         return iterate_real_redirected(7, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00500     case 9:
00501         return iterate_real_redirected(9, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00502     case 11:
00503         return iterate_real_redirected(11, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00504     default:
00505         return iterate_real_redirected(cnt, s_fields_real[site1][site2], i, j, k, site2);
00506     }
00507 }
00508 MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00509 MonteCarlo::iterate_rec_generic(Vector3<double> pos1, int i, int j, int k)
00510 {
00511     Vector3<double> h;
00512     for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00513         h += iterate_rec_generic(pos1, i, j, k, site2);
00514     }
00515     return h;
00516 }
00517 MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00518 MonteCarlo::iterate_rec_generic(Vector3<double> pos1, int i, int j, int k, int site2)
00519 {
00520     int cutoff = s_cutoff_rec;
00521     int cnt = 2*cutoff+1;
00522     pos1 *= LATTICE_CONST;
00523     complex<Spin> *pspin = &m_spins_rec[site2][0];
00524     const Vector3<Spin> *pfield = &s_fields_rec_generic[site2][0];
00525     
00526     double phx = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (i * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.x);
00527     double phy = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (j * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.y);
00528     double phz = 2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (k * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.z);
00529     complex<Spin> exp_i_rx = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phx));
00530     complex<Spin> exp_i_ry = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phy));
00531     complex<Spin> exp_i_rz = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phz));
00532     Vector3<Spin> h;
00533     complex<Spin> exp_ikrz = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, -cutoff * (phx + phy)));
00534     for(int kz = 0; kz <= cutoff; kz++) {
00535         complex<Spin> exp_ikryz = exp_ikrz;
00536         for(int ky = -cutoff; ky <= cutoff; ky++) {
00537             complex<Spin> exp_ikr = exp_ikryz;
00538             for(int n = 0; n < cnt; n++) {
00539                 Vector3<Spin> e(pfield[n]);
00540                 e *= real(pspin[n] * exp_ikr);
00541                 h += e;
00542                 exp_ikr *= exp_i_rx;
00543             }
00544             pspin+=cnt;
00545             pfield+=cnt;
00546             exp_ikryz *= exp_i_ry;
00547         }
00548         exp_ikrz *= exp_i_rz;
00549     }
00550     return h;
00551 }
00552 inline double
00553 MonteCarlo::iterate_rec_redirected(int cutoff, int site1, int i, int j, int k, int site2)
00554 {
00555     int cnt = 2*cutoff+1;
00556     Spin h = 0.0;
00557     complex<Spin> *pspin = &m_spins_rec[site2][0];
00558     Spin *pfield = &s_fields_rec[site1][site2][0];
00559 
00560     if(s_exp_ph[site1].size()) {
00561         complex<Spin> *pexp_ph =
00562             &s_exp_ph[site1][lattice_index(i,j,k) * m_spins_rec[site2].size()];
00563         for(int m = 0; m < (cutoff+1)*(2*cutoff+1); m++) {
00564             for(int n = 0; n < cnt; n++) {
00565                 h += pfield[n] * real(pspin[n] * pexp_ph[n]);
00566 //                ASSERT(pfield == &s_fields_rec[site1][site2][reciprocal_index(kx,ky,kz)]);
00567             }
00568             pspin+=cnt;
00569             pfield+=cnt;
00570             pexp_ph+=cnt;
00571         }
00572     }
00573     else {
00574         Vector3<double> pos1(cg_ASitePositions[site1]);
00575         pos1 *= 1.0/4.0;
00576         h = iterate_rec_generic(pos1, i, j, k, site2)
00577             .innerProduct(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00578     }
00579     // subtract self-energy.
00580     if(site1 == site2) {
00581         Spin spin_self = readSpin(site1, spins_real_index(i,j,k));
00582         h -=  s_fields_rec_sum * spin_self;
00583     }
00584 //    ASSERT(pspin == &*m_spins_rec[site2].end());
00585 //    ASSERT(pfield == &*s_fields_rec[site1][site2].end());
00586     return h;
00587 }
00588 double
00589 MonteCarlo::iterate_rec(int site1, int i, int j, int k, int site2)
00590 {
00591     int cutoff = s_cutoff_rec;
00592     // Trick to use constant count. use -funroll-loops. to enhance optimization.
00593     switch(cutoff) {
00594     case 2:
00595         return iterate_rec_redirected(2, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00596     case 3:
00597         return iterate_rec_redirected(3, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00598     case 4:
00599         return iterate_rec_redirected(4, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00600     case 5:
00601         return iterate_rec_redirected(5, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00602     case 6:
00603         return iterate_rec_redirected(6, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00604     case 7:
00605         return iterate_rec_redirected(7, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00606     default:
00607         return iterate_rec_redirected(cutoff, site1, i, j, k, site2);
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 
00612 // Thread pool.
00613 void
00614 MonteCarlo::execute()
00615 {
00616     for(;;) {
00617         int left = m_hint_site2_left;
00618         if(left <= 1) {
00619             XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_thread_pool_cond);
00620             if(m_bTerminated)
00621                 break;
00622             m_thread_pool_cond.wait();
00623             continue;
00624         }
00625         if(!m_hint_site2_left.compareAndSet(left, left - 1))
00626             continue;
00627     
00628         int site2 = m_hint_sec_cache_miss[left - 1];
00629         ASSERT(site2 < 16);
00630 
00631         readBarrier();
00632         m_hint_fields[site2] = iterate_interactions(
00633             m_hint_spin1_site, m_hint_spin1_lattice_index, site2);
00634         memoryBarrier();
00635         if(m_hint_site2_not_done.decAndTest()) {
00636             XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_hint_site2_last_cond);
00637             m_hint_site2_last_cond.signal();
00638         }
00639     }
00640 }
00641 
00642 double
00643 MonteCarlo::hinteraction_miscache(int sec_cache_miss_cnt, int site1, int lidx)
00644 {
00645     double h = 0.0;
00646     
00647 // threaded summation.
00648 
00649     m_hint_spin1_site = site1;
00650     m_hint_spin1_lattice_index = lidx;
00651 //    memoryBarrier();
00652     m_hint_site2_not_done = sec_cache_miss_cnt;
00653     // this is trigger.
00654     m_hint_site2_left = sec_cache_miss_cnt;
00655     {
00656 //    XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_thread_pool_cond);
00657         m_thread_pool_cond.broadcast();
00658     }
00659 
00660     for(;;) {
00661         int left = m_hint_site2_left;
00662         if(left == 0) {
00663             XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_hint_site2_last_cond);
00664             while(m_hint_site2_not_done > 0) {
00665                 m_hint_site2_last_cond.wait();
00666             }
00667             break;
00668         }
00669         if(!m_hint_site2_left.compareAndSet(left, left - 1))
00670             continue;
00671         
00672         int site2 = m_hint_sec_cache_miss[left - 1];
00673         ASSERT(site2 < 16);
00674         
00675         m_hint_fields[site2] = iterate_interactions(site1, lidx, site2);
00676         if(m_hint_site2_not_done.decAndTest()) {            
00677             readBarrier();
00678             break;
00679         }
00680     }
00681  
00682     for(int miss = 0; miss < sec_cache_miss_cnt; miss++) {  
00683         int site2 = m_hint_sec_cache_miss[miss];
00684         h += m_hint_fields[site2];
00685     }
00686     return h;
00687 }
